detail_desc: Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.

Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and long balloon sleeves with elastication and a flounced trim at the cuffs. Flounced trim around the neckline and down the front.
Suede platform sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles and adjustable ankle strap with a metal fastener. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front approx. 4 cm, heel 4.5 cm.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs with narrow hems.
Short, fitted, one-shoulder dress in ribbed jersey with two shoulder straps at one side. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit with low dropped shoulders, flounces at the sides and a wide neckline.
Trousers in superstretch twill with a high waist with concealed elastication, and slim legs with narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in waffled jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved top in soft, lightweight wool jersey with press-studs on the shoulders and a gently rounded hem.
Ankle-length, circular skirt in woven fabric with a high waist that has a zip and button at one side.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and an adjustable tab with buttons at the sides. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with decorative straps at the front and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated trim at the hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Bikini top with underwired, gathered, thickly padded, moulded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow ties that fasten at the back of the neck and an adjustable fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide trousers in lightly crinkled velvet made from a silk blend. Wide, covered elastication at the waist, pockets in the side seams and straight legs.

Leggings in superstretch, flexible denim with appliqués. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. The cotton content of the leggings is partly recycled.
Soft jersey, boxy-style top with a sequined motif on the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Short, fitted, rib-knit top with a deep V-neck, zip at the top and short sleeves.
High-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a concealed zip at one side and slim legs.
Calf-length kaftan in a pima cotton weave with a round neckline, concealed button at the top and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Calf-length dress in tulle with shoulder straps and a beaded bodice. Concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist with a small frill trim and a skirt with beaded and sequined embroidery. Jersey lining.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, V-neck and slits in the sides.
Short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt.
V-neck satin cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace details.
Cardigan in a soft knit with long sleeves, a wrapover front and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short-sleeved, printed running top with a jersey front and back made from ventilating mesh. Taped details, taped ventilation holes under the arms, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Set with a dress and pair of puff pants in soft, organic slub cotton jersey. Dress with a press-stud on one shoulder and flutter sleeves. Puff pants with elastication and a small frill trim at the waist and around the legs.
Cap in woven fabric with text embroidery at the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Kaftan in an airy weave with a V-neck, buttons at the front and high slits in the sides.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem. Unlined.

Shoulder bag in sturdy imitation leather with a suede flap, metal fastener and adjustable metal chain shoulder strap. One large outer compartment at the front and one inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 4.5x16.5x22 cm.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft wool and cashmere blend with a ribbed polo neck with slits and a ribbed hem with slits.

Blouse in sturdy, transparent plumeti organza with a sheen. Deep opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and short, elasticated, raglan balloon sleeves. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the back, and a flared peplum. Chiffon lining.
Body in glossy jersey with a draped neckline at the back, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Trousers in twill made from a wool blend with a regular waist, pleats at the top, concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Wide, gently tapered legs with creases.
Knee-length shorts in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch, side and back pockets and ribbed hems.
Signet rings in various designs made from recycled zinc.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a roll-edge neckline, sewn on bow at the front, button on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a textured cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Knee-length shorts in waffled cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Regular fit.
Jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap patch pockets with press-studs, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Sleeveless, round-necked top in jersey crêpe with pleats front and back and an opening with a button at the top.

Knee-length, straight-cut dress in a softly draping weave with a small stand-up collar and a V-neck with a concealed button at the front. 3/4-length sleeves with a shiny metal button at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Hand-sewn coat in felted wool containing some cashmere with notch lapels, a detachable tie belt at the waist, large patch front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Short skirt in a patterned weave with a slight sheen. Regular waist, wide smocking at the top and tiers to the hem. Partly lined in viscose.
Pyjama bottoms in soft cotton flannel with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Medium support.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Headband knitted in soft cashmere with a wrapover front.
Short blouse in a cotton weave with flounces, a small stand-up collar with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Knee-length shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Large patch front pockets and a patch pocket with a button at the back.

Short, A-line dress in washed cotton denim. Opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the hems, and gathered seams in the skirt. Unlined.
5-pocket shorts in soft, stretch denim with a concealed drawstring at the waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.
Sandals with a heel strap with covered elastic at the back. Imitation leather insoles.
Waist bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable waist strap, a zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size approx. 8x14x25 cm.
Long-sleeved cardigans in a soft cotton knit with a round neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved body in lace and mesh with a V-neck front and back and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.
Slim-fit, denim-look leggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist.

Trainers in fabric with imitation leather sections. Padded top edge, elasticated lacing, a hook and loop tab at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Linings and insoles in mesh made partly from recycled polyester and chunky patterned soles.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with cut-off, raw edges.
Tube scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere.
Dressing gown in softly draping satin with long puff sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs and narrow ties at the waist.

Fleece-lined jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front, a zipped chest pocket and flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening. Adjustable tab and elastication at the cuffs, folded seams and reflective details. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Shirt dress in a cotton weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Long sleeves with a gathered seam and buttoned cuffs.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Fitted, one-shoulder top in satin made partly from recycled polyester and tulle in RENU™ polyester. Layers of large tulle flounces at the top and a tulle-covered bodice with a concealed zip in one side. RENU™ polyester is a high-quality polyester made from raw material recycled from used textiles.
Calf-length wrapover skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist and concealed button and ties at one side. Unlined.
Short top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Button details at the neckline and cuffs.

Lightly padded quilted jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Flap patch pockets with concealed press-studs, and a yoke and decorative seams at the back. Lined.
Sleeveless top in lightly crêped jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and medium coverage at the back.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck with buttons at the top and pleats on the chest. Seam at the waist with a tie detail, pleats and gathers at the front, gathers at the back, pockets in the side seams and long, wide legs.
